txt: D.5.   Title:Sales Proposal Development Description:Develops technical proposals to meet customer solution requirements and provide sales personnel with a competitive bid. Underlines the energy efficiency and environmental impact related to a proposal. Collaborates with colleagues to align the service or product solution with the organisation's capacity to deliver. levels: 2: Organises collaboration between relevant internal departments, for example, technical, sales and legal. Facilitates comparison between customer requirement and available 'off the shelf' solutions. 3: Acts creatively to develop proposal incorporating a complex solution. Customises solution in a complex technical and legal environment and ensures feasibility, legal and technical validity of customer offer.
